message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I think a 65-35 split is fairer, given the value of the money is decreasing with each round. Let's end this quickly.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
I'm increasing my offer again. This is my final proposal, let's end this.
You said that was your final proposal, but I'm still not convinced. I'll give you one more chance to accept a reasonable offer.
